name: invalid_decstbm_ignored_fullscreen_scroll
description: Invalid DECSTBM (top >= bottom) is ignored, so IND at screen bottom scrolls the full screen
comment: Fill rows with A..E at col 0. DECSTBM(4,2) is invalid and must be ignored. CUP to last row and IND should scroll full-screen (A drops), then print Z at bottom.
